property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, can only be played after a successfully played card. You may search your Arsenal for 1 card with the word 'technical'in the title, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. As an action, this card is -4F and -6D, put this card on the bottom of your Arsenal and your opponent discards 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played Set-up Action card or a card with the word 'shoot'in the title. Cannot be reversed by the cards titled Lift a Boot or Overshot Your Mark. Your opponent cannot play the card titled Over Sell Maneuver immediately after you play this card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played 2D or greater maneuver. When played, discard up to 5 cards from your Backlash deck. This card is -2F for each card discarded. When successfully played, put 1 card and 1 High Risk maneuver from your Ringside pile into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, this card is -3D, discard this card and then search your Arsenal or Ringside pile for 1 card with the word 'dynamic'in the title, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. You cannot play Action cards with the word 'dynamic'in the title for the rest of the turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, this card is -3F and -6D, discard this card and then search your Arsenal or Ringside pile for 1 card with the word 'dynamic'in the title, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. You cannot play Action cards with the word 'dynamic'in the title for the rest of the turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: This card is -4F when your Fortitude Rating is less than or equal to your opponent's Fortitude Rating.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is in your Ringside pile, if you successfully play a Volley maneuver, you may put this card into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be reversed by the card titled Step Aside. Your opponent cannot play the card titled Over Sell Maneuver immediately after you play this card. If this card is not successfully played, remove up to 2 cards in your opponent's Ringside pile from the game.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, this card is -6F and -9D, discard this card and then search your Arsenal or Ringside pile for 1 card with the word 'dynamic'in the title, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. You cannot play Action cards with the word 'dynamic'in the title for the rest of the turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, you may search your Arsenal for 1 card with the word 'technical' in the title, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. As an action, this card is -4F and -8D, discard this card and any number of other cards with the word 'technical' in the title, look at your opponents hand, choose the same number of cards discarded -1, and he discards the chosen cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, this card is -9F and -12D, discard this card and then search your Arsenal or Ringside pile for 1 card with the word 'dynamic'in the title, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. You cannot play Action cards with the word 'dynamic'in the title for the rest of the turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played, name a number 5 or less. Your opponent puts up to that many cards from his Ringside pile on the bottom of his Arsenal. This card is -2F for each number named. Can only be reversed from your opponent's hand. When successfully played, discard 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You may play this card from your Ringside pile. When played from your Ringside pile, remove all Reversal cards in your Ring area from the game.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When successfully played, you may discard any number of cards and then draw the same number of cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, this card is -12F and -15D, discard this card and then search your Arsenal or Ringside pile for 1 card with the word 'dynamic'in the title, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. You cannot play Action cards with the word 'dynamic'in the title for the rest of the turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be packed by Female Superstars. When successfully played, search your opponent's Arsenal for cards equal to the number of Volley maneuvers in your Ring area and remove them from the game. He shuffles his Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played, discard 2 cards. Put cards discarded with the word 'DDT'in the title on the bottom of your Arsenal and draw 2 cards for each put on the bottom.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, this card is -1F and -4D, discard this card and then search your Arsenal or Ringside pile for 1 card with the word 'dynamic'in the title, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. You cannot play Action cards with the word 'dynamic'in the title for the rest of the turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, this card is -4F and -7D, discard this card and then search your Arsenal or Ringside pile for 1 card with the word 'dynamic'in the title, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. You cannot play Action cards with the word 'dynamic'in the title for the rest of the turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When successfully played, overturn 1 card. If that card is a non-Heat card, it goes into your hand instead of into your Ringside pile.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You may play this card from your Ringside pile. When played from your Ringside pile, your opponent looks at your Backlash deck, chooses 1 non-unique card, and you discard the chosen card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be reversed by hybrid Reversal cards. As a reversal, reverse any card with the word 'dynamic'in the title and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, this card is -7F and -10D, discard this card and then search your Arsenal or Ringside pile for 1 card with the word 'dynamic'in the title, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. You cannot play Action cards with the word 'dynamic'in the title for the rest of the turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, this card is -10F and -13D, discard this card and then search your Arsenal or Ringside pile for 1 card with the word 'dynamic'in the title, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. You cannot play Action cards with the word 'dynamic'in the title for the rest of the turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played, name a number 5 or less. Your opponent shuffles that many of his cards that have been removed from the game into his Arsenal. This card is -2F for each number named.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, this card is -13F and -16D, discard this card and then search your Arsenal or Ringside pile for 1 card with the word 'dynamic'in the title, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. You cannot play Action cards with the word 'dynamic'in the title for the rest of the turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, you may search your Arsenal for 1 card with the word 'technical' in the title, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. As an action, this card is -8F and -14D, shuffle this card into your Arsenal and then draw 1 card or your opponent discards 4 cards from his Backlash deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: This card is -4F and +2 Stun Value for each of the following cards in your Ring area: Face Driver, Go-behind, Slap, Shoulder Thrust, Throw, Toss, or Vertical DDT Drop. Can only be played when you have at least 1 of those cards in your Ring area.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: This card is -1F and +1D for every Chain card in your Ring area.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, this card is -2F and -5D, discard this card and then search your Arsenal or Ringside pile for 1 card with the word 'dynamic'in the title, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. You cannot play Action cards with the word 'dynamic'in the title for the rest of the turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When successfully played, if your opponent does not have any Heat cards in his Ringside pile, search your Arsenal for 1 Heat card, reveal it to him, put it into your hand, shuffle your Arsenal, and your next Heat maneuver played this turn is +6D.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, this card is -5F and -8D, discard this card and then search your Arsenal or Ringside pile for 1 card with the word 'dynamic'in the title, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. You cannot play Action cards with the word 'dynamic'in the title for the rest of the turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You may play this card from your Ringside pile. When played from your Ringside pile, remove all cards in your Ringside pile that do not have the word 'blindside'in the title from the game.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played, choose any number of cards in your hand. This card is +1D for every chosen card. Cannot be reversed by hybrid Reversal cards. When successfully played, put the chosen cards under this card. When this card is in your Ring area, your cards are -2F for every card under this card. When this card is removed from your Ring area, put the cards under this card into your Ringside pile.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played, choose any number of cards in your hand. When successfully played, put the chosen cards under this card. When this card is in your Ring area, your cards are -2F for every card under this card and you may play those cards as if they were in your hand. When this card is removed from your Ring area, put the cards under this card into your Ringside pile.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, this card is -8F and -11D, discard this card and then search your Arsenal or Ringside pile for 1 card with the word 'dynamic'in the title, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. You cannot play Action cards with the word 'dynamic'in the title for the rest of the turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, this card is -11F and -14D, discard this card and then search your Arsenal or Ringside pile for 1 card with the word 'dynamic'in the title, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. You cannot play Action cards with the word 'dynamic'in the title for the rest of the turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played card. When played, name a number 5 or less. Your opponent puts up to that many Backlash deck cards from his Ringside pile into his Backlash deck. This card is -2F for each number named. Can only be reversed from your opponent's Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, you may search your Arsenal for 1 card with the word 'technical' in the title, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. As an action, this card is -2F and -6D, put this card and 1 card from your Ringside pile on the bottom of your Arsenal and your opponent overturns 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played card. When successfully played, you may put 1 card from your Ringside pile into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, this card is -14F and -17D, discard this card and then search your Arsenal or Ringside pile for 1 card with the word 'dynamic'in the title, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. You cannot play Action cards with the word 'dynamic'in the title for the rest of the turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When successfully played, your opponent discards cards and you shuffle cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal equal to the number of the following cards in your Ring area: Face Driver, Go-behind, Slap, Shoulder Thrust, Throw, Toss, and Vertical DDT Drop.

card.name: It's Great To Be Back Here In...

property.name: Card Text
property.value: This card ignores any 'can only be reversed'restriction from a card. Reverse any non-unique card with a 'can only be reversed'restriction and end your opponent's turn. The first card you play on your next turn is -10F if you have a Venue card in your Ring area.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reverse any card with the word 'blindside,''dynamic,''precision,'or 'technical'in the title and end your opponent's turn. The reversed card is removed from the game.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reverse any Mid-match card and end your opponent's turn. The reversed card is removed from the game. If overturned when applying damage, you may remove this card from the game and put 1 Mid-match card from your Ringside pile into your Backlash deck. When this card is in your Ring area, your opponent's Mid-match Reversal cards are +10F.

card.name: Once Again, Kissing Up to the Fans!

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reverse any non-unique card if your opponent has 4 or more Fan Favorite cards in his Ring area or reverse any Fan Favorite card and end his turn. When this card is in your Ringside pile, during your turn you may remove 8 cards in your Ringside pile from the game. If you do, search your Arsenal for 1 Cheater card or 1 Fan Favorite card, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

card.name: You Can't Cheat an Honest Man...

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reverse any non-unique card if your opponent has 4 or more Cheater cards in his Ring area or reverse any Cheater card and end his turn. When this card is in your Ringside pile, during your turn your may remove this card from the game and then put 1 Cheater card or 1 Fan Favorite card from your Ringside pile into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent's maneuvers next turn are +1F times his Superstar Value. When this card is in your Ring area, during your opponent's turn you may remove this card from the game and your next Reversal card played this turn is -1F times your Superstar Value.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Choose 1 Maneuver card in your Ringside pile with Fortitude greater than your Fortitude Rating and less than your opponent's Fortitude Rating. You may play that card from your Ringside pile as your next card played this turn, regardless of your Fortitude Rating.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You may remove 1 Maneuver card in your Ringside pile with Fortitude greater than your Fortitude Rating from the game. If you do, your next maneuver played this turn is -2F for every card of yours removed from the game and it can only be reversed by hybrid or unique Reversal cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Shuffle up to 6 cards with the word 'precision'in the title from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal. When this card is in your Ring area, your maneuvers with the word 'precision'in the title are +1 Stun Value.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Draw 2 cards. Your next card played this turn is considered a Multi card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent randomly discards cards equal to half the number of Cheater cards in your Ring area, rounded down, +2.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: This card can be reversed by the cards titled Step Aside, Escape Move, and Lift a Boot.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is in your Ring area, you may put this card into your Ringside pile to reverse any card not played from your opponent's hand or any Activated Card Effect and end his turn. When this card is in your Ring area or hand, your cards titled Ashley: Pretty Punk may replace 1 card listed on WWE Divas: The Next Generation or WWE Divas Rule!

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Search your Arsenal for 2 non-unique cards, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. When this card is in your Ring area or hand, your cards titled Mickie: Fervent Fanatic may replace 1 card listed on WWE Divas: The Next Generation or WWE Divas Rule!

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, this card is -10F, draw 1 card. As a reversal, when overturned, if your Fortitude Rating is less than your opponent's Fortitude Rating, reverse any non-unique maneuver and end his turn. When this card is in your Ring area, if you have overturned damage from a maneuver, you may put this card into your Ringside pile and then end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reveal the top 5 cards of your Arsenal, put 2 into your hand, and remove the rest from the game.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: After all players' Pre-match phases, before the first turn of the game, all players reveal their hands. If you have fewer Reversal cards in your hand than your opponent has in his hand, he shuffles 2 Reversal cards from his hand into his Arsenal and you put 1 card from your hand on the bottom of your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is in your Ring area, when you successfully play a maneuver with the word 'technical'in the title, choose 1: draw 1 card and then put 1 card from your hand on the bottom of your Arsenal, or put 1 card from your Ringside pile on the bottom of your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You cannot play non-Superstar-specific maneuvers not listed on this card. Once during each of your turns you may discard 1 card and then shuffle 2 cards listed on this card from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal. Once during each of your turns you may discard 1 card and then search your Arsenal for 1 card titled Superplex, Wheelbarrow Slam, Neck Breaker, Arm Breaker, Waist Lock, Flying Head Scissors, Leg Drop, Splash, Moonsault, Whirling Backhand, European Uppercut, Rib Breaker, Back Breaker, Double Leg Takedown, Fireman's Carry, Brainbuster, Airplane Spin, Chin Lock, Chicken Wing, Abdominal Stretch, STF, or Figure Four Leg Lock, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: At the end of the Pre-match phase, search your Arsenal for 2 different non-unique cards that are Chain, Heat, or Volley maneuvers, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. You can only play maneuvers that are Superstar-specific, Chain, Heat, or Volley maneuvers. You cannot play a maneuver with the same title as a maneuver in your Ring area.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: All players' maneuvers cannot be reversed by non-Superstar-specific hybrid Reversal cards. Your maneuvers also cannot be reversed from your opponent's Backlash deck. Your maneuvers are +2 Stun Value. You cannot play non-unique maneuvers not titled Arm Bar, Arm Bar Takedown, Arm Drag, Atomic Drop, Belly to Back Suplex, Belly to Belly Suplex, Body Slam, Chop, Clothesline, Collar and Elbow Lockup, Drop Kick, Haymaker, Head Butt, Hip Toss, Press Slam, Punch, Roundhouse Punch, Russian Leg Sweep, Snap Mare, Vertical Suplex, Wrist Lock, Backhand Slap, Drop Toe Hold, Elbow Drop, Foot Stomp, or Hammerlock.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: All players search their Arsenal for any number of hybrid Reversal cards and remove them from the game. Then, all players search their opponent's Arsenal and if they find more than 6 hybrid Reversal cards (if their opponent does not have an Enforcer card revealed, do not count Superstar-specific, Set-up, or Volley cards) their opponent loses the game via Pinfall Victory. All players shuffle their Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Once during each of your turns, you may search your Arsenal for 1 card titled Back Breaker Torture Rack, Front Chancery, Rolling Headlock Vise, Short Arm Rib Breaker, Super Hold, Superkick, or Suplex, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. You cannot play Backlash deck Reversal cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: The maximum number of Pre-match cards you may have in your Ring area is reduced by 1. Search your Arsenal for 10 cards, put them under this card, and shuffle your Arsenal. Once during each of your turns, when a card under this card is titled Bulldog Takedown, Charismatic Style, Chop to the Chest, Comeback!, Corkscrew DDT, DDT, Dem Damn Dudleyz, Did I Just Say Three Minutes?, Don't Cross the Boss, Drawing Extra Heat, Great Technical Knowledge, Gut Punch, Hurricanrana, Knife-edge Chop, Ladder in the Ring, Single Arm DDT, Springboard, Table! Table! Table!, or Who Booked This Match?, you may play that card as if it were in your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played maneuver and when your Fortitude Rating is greater than your opponent's Fortitude Rating. Your opponent may remove the card titled Kick Out! in his Ring area from the game. If he does not, he overturns cards until he overturns 3 non-hybrid Reversal cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played, choose Grapple or Submission. This card is considered to be only the chosen type. When successfully played, your next card played this turn is -15F.

card.name: A Punch That'll Take Someone's Head Off

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When successfully played, look at your opponent's hand, choose 1 card, and he discards the chosen card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Search your Arsenal for 1 card with the word 'precision'in the title, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played when you have a card in your Ring area with the word 'shoot'in the title. Reverse any card that moves any number of cards from any Ringside pile, any card that allows your opponent to draw any number of cards, or any non-unique hybrid card and end his turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: For each maneuver with the word 'blindside'in the title in your Ring area, your opponent discards 1 card, you put 1 of your cards that has been removed from the game on top of your Arsenal, shuffle 1 card from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal, and draw 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Randomly discard 1 card. All players reveal their Backlash decks and discard all Reversal cards except 1.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played when your Superstar Value is greater than your opponent's Superstar Value or when you have more Fan Favorite cards in your Ring area than he has in his Ring area. For the rest of the turn, your maneuvers are +1D and +1 Stun Value for every Fan Favorite card in your Ring area and +1D times your Superstar Value.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played when you have 4 or more Volley maneuvers in your Ring area. When this card is in your Ringside pile, during your turn you may discard 2 Volley maneuvers and then put this card into your Backlash deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: During your Draw Segment, draw an additional 3 cards. Your cards titled Spit at Opponent are -4F and not Heel cards. Your opponent cannot play any card with the word 'cool' in the title.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be revealed from your Backstage Area when you reveal your Superstar card. During your turn you may hide this card and then look at your opponent's hand, choose 1 card, and he puts the chosen card on the bottom of his Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: The maximum number of Pre-match cards you may have in your Ring area is increased by 1. When this card is in your Ring area, during your turn you may put this card into your Ringside pile and then search your Arsenal for 1 non-unique Maneuver card, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. When this card is in your Ringside pile, during your turn you may remove this card from the game and then shuffle up to 4 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal.

card.name: I Spit In the Face Of...

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put up to 3 cards from your hand on the bottom of your Arsenal and then put that many cards from your opponent's Ring area into his Ringside pile.

card.name: ...People Who Don't Want to Be Cool

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be reversed when the card titled I Spit In the Face Of... is in your Ring area. Put any number of cards from your hand on top of your Arsenal and then shuffle up to double that many cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, this card is -20F and -20D, shuffle this card and 1 card from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your cards with the word 'DDT' in the title cannot be reversed by hybrid cards. Once during each of your turns you may reveal 1 card from your hand with the word 'DDT' in the title, put that card on the bottom of your Arsenal, and then look at your opponent's hand, choose 1 card, and he puts the chosen card on the bottom of his Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is in your Ring area, if your Fortitude Rating is less than your opponent's Fortitude Rating and you have fewer cards in your hand than him, during your turn you may put this card into your Ringside pile and then all players put all cards in their hands on the bottom of their Arsenal and you may put 1 card from your Ringside pile into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Search your Arsenal for 2 cards with the word 'DDT' in the title, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. When your next card played this turn is a card with the word 'DDT'in the title, it is -13F.

card.name: The Snake Will Always Bite Back

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put any number of cards with the word 'DDT'in the title from your Ring area and Ringside pile on top of your Arsenal and then shuffle the same number of cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal and search your opponent's Arsenal for the same number of cards, remove them from the game, and he shuffles his Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, this card is -20F and can only be played after a successfully played maneuver. As a reversal, reverse any card and end your opponent's turn.

card.name: The Million Dollar Man Ted DiBiase

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Once during any turn you may remove 1 card in your Ring area from the game and then your next card played that turn is -3F times the Damage of the removed card. Once during each of your turns you may remove 1 card in your Ring area from the game and then your opponent removes 1 Reversal card in his Ring area from the game with Damage equal to or greater than your removed card's Damage.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: At the end of the Pre-match phase, you may search your Arsenal for 1 Foil card, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. Your Superstar Value is +3 Once during each of your turns you may remove 1 card in your hand from the game and then look at your opponent's hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent chooses a number from 1 to 10 and overturns that many cards. Search your Arsenal for non-hybrid Maneuver cards equal to the difference between the chosen number and 10, reveal them to him, put them into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be reversed when the card titled Everybody's Got a Price is in your Ring area. Your opponent discards cards equal to the number of your cards removed from the game.

property.name: SS Logos
property.value: The Million Dollar Man, The Rattlesnake

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When successfully played, you may put 1 card from your opponent's Ring area into his Ringside pile. When your next card played this turn is the card titled Maintain Hold, you may ignore the 'Can only be played after...'text.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent cannot play Reversal cards from his hand or Ringside pile to your Volley cards unless he first removes the top 5 cards of his Arsenal from the game. You may pack any cards with the Booker T logo, but you do not count as that Superstar.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: At the end of the Pre-match phase, you may choose 1 card in your opponent's Ring area. When this card is in your Ring area, that card is considered to have blank text and once during each of your turns you may search your Arsenal for 1 card with the word 'Sharmell'in the title, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reverse any card and end your opponent's turn. Search your Arsenal for 1 card, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. The first card you play on your next turn is -10F.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, this card is -5D, shuffle this card into your Arsenal and then draw 2 cards. As a reversal, reverse any Submission maneuver and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When successfully played, you may search your Arsenal for 1 Superstar-specific card, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Search your opponent's Arsenal for 5 cards and remove them from the game. He shuffles his Arsenal. His Reversal cards to your next card played this turn are +25F.

card.name: The Largest Athlete in Sports Entertainment

property.name: SS Logos
property.value: The Largest Athlete in Sports Entertainment

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You cannot pack High Risk maneuvers. Your non-Multi Strike, Grapple, and Submission maneuvers played from hand are F:0. When you successfully play a maneuver and damage has been applied, end your turn. When you end your turn without playing a maneuver from hand, your opponent may put 1 card from your Ring into your Ringside. You may pack Big Show cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent's Pre-match cards do not reduce your Starting Hand Size. The maximum number of Pre-match and Mid-match cards you may have in your Ring area is increased by 1. Your Starting Hand Size is +1. The maximum number of Pre-match and Mid-match cards your opponent may have in his Ring area is decreased by 1. His Starting Hand Size is -1.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played, discard up to 2 Superstar-specific cards. This card is -10F for each card discarded.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, this card is -6F, search your Arsenal for 1 card, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. You may ignore the 'Can only be played after...'text on your next card played this turn. As a reversal, reverse any Action card and end your opponent's turn. He discards 3 cards.

card.name: The Big and The Small of It

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played when your Fortitude Rating is greater than your opponent's Fortitude Rating and when you have fewer cards in your hand than him. Your opponent overturns cards equal to the difference between your Fortitude Rating and his and you draw cards until you have the same number of cards in your hand as him.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When your opponent successfully plays a maneuver, choose 1: he removes the top 2 cards of his Arsenal from the game or he overturns 3 cards. You may pack any cards with the Lita logo, but you do not count as that Superstar.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Look at your opponent's hand, choose 1 card, and he discards the chosen card. Put 1 card from your Ringside pile into your hand. Your next card played this turn is F:0 and you may ignore the 'Can only be played after...'text.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put 1 Pre-match card from your Ringside pile into your Ring area and put up to 3 cards from your Ringside pile into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be reversed from your opponent's hand. When successfully played, search your Arsenal for 1 Superstar-specific card, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reverse any non-unique maneuver or Superstar-specific Action card and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, put 1 other card from your Ring area into your hand, put 1 card from your opponent's Ring area into his Ringside pile, and end your turn. As a reversal, this card is -15F, reverse any High Risk maneuver and end your opponent's turn. Draw up to 3 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Once during each of your turns you may discard 1 High Risk maneuver and then put up to 3 cards from your Ringside pile on the bottom of your Arsenal. Once during each of your turns you may overturn 3 cards and then put 1 High Risk maneuver from your Ringside pile into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reverse any non-unique card and end your opponent's turn. You may shuffle 1 card from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal and then draw 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: The maximum number of Pre-match cards your opponent may have in his Ring area is reduced by 1. At the end of the Pre-match phase, search your Arsenal for 1 High Risk maneuver or 1 Foreign Object, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played when you have 10 or fewer cards in your Arsenal and your opponent has more than 10 cards in his Arsenal. Put 5 cards from your Ringside pile into your hand and shuffle 5 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When your Fortitude Rating is less than your opponent's Fortitude Rating, this card is -7F. Draw 3 cards. When this card is in your Ring area, during your turn you may put this card into your Ringside pile and then your opponent discards 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played card. When successfully played after a High Risk maneuver, you may put up to 3 High Risk maneuvers from your Ringside pile into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You cannot pack Hybrid cards. Your Pre-match cards with the word 'Funaki' in the title have the added text of 'The maximum number of Pre-match cards you may have in your Ring area is increased by 1.' Your opponent cannot play any card with the word 'Funaki' in the title.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played card. When played after the card titled From the Top Rope, From the Middle Turnbuckle, or Springboard, can only be reversed from your opponent's hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played card. When successfully played, search your Arsenal for 1 Unique card and the card titled Springboard, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

card.name: I'll Do Anything For the Scoop, But...

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reverse any Activated Card Effect or any non-unique card and end your opponent's turn. Search your Arsenal and Ringside pile for the card titled ...I Do Ask the Tough Questions, reveal it to him, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played when you have the card titled I'll Do Anything For the Scoop, But... in your Ring area. Shuffle cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal and your opponent discards cards both equal to the number of Action cards in your Ring area.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: This card is -10F if your opponent used an Activated Card Effect during his last turn. If he did not, can only be played after a successfully played maneuver or the card titled Springboard. This card is -5F when played after the card titled Springboard.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Once during each of your turns you may discard 1 card and then search your Arsenal for the card titled From the Top Rope or From the Middle Turnbuckle or 1 maneuver with the word 'blindside,' 'precision,' or 'technical' in the title; reveal it to your opponent; put it into your hand; and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is in your Ring area, your cards with the word 'blindside'in the title are -1F; your maneuvers with the word 'precision' in the title are -2F; your maneuvers with the word 'technical' in the title are +1D; and you may put this card into your Ringside pile to reverse any maneuver that is not a Chain, Heat, or Volley maneuver and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reverse any non-unique maneuver if your opponent has a Maneuver card in his Ring area or any non-unique Action card if he has an Action card in his Ring area and end his turn. Look at his hand, choose 1 card, and he discards the chosen card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after the card titled From the Middle Turnbuckle or From the Top Rope. Can only be reversed from your opponent's hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after the card titled From the Middle Turnbuckle or From the Top Rope. Can only be reversed from your opponent's Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your cards titled Irish Whip, Throw Into the Corner Turnbuckle, and Gut Wrench and your Strike and Grapple maneuvers played after those cards are all -8F.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played maneuver. When this card is in your Ringside pile, if you have the cards titled Irish Whip, Throw Into the Corner Turnbuckle, and Gut Wrench in your Ring area, during your turn you may put this card into your hand and then put 1 of each of them from your Ring area into your hand.

card.name: A Big Man Has A Big ... Appetite

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reverse any non-unique card and end your opponent's turn. All players remove the top 5 cards of their Arsenal from the game.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Shuffle up to 5 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal and then draw up to 5 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played maneuver. Can only be reversed from your opponent's hand. When successfully played, your opponent discards his Backlash deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, can only be played after the card titled Irish Whip. As a reversal, reverse any Set-up card or Run-in card and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after the card titled Patented Austin Kick to the Gut. Search your Arsenal and Ring area for the card titled Stone Cold Stunner, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, shuffle your Arsenal, and for the rest of the turn you can play that card regardless of your Fortitude Rating.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put cards from your Ringside pile on the bottom of your Arsenal equal to the number of Superstar-specific cards in your Ring area. Your opponent overturns that many cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played, search your Arsenal for up to 10 Superstar-specific cards, put them into your Ringside pile, and shuffle your Arsenal. This card is -1F for each card put into your Ringside pile in this way. When you have 3 cards titled Bring the Hammer Down in your Ring area, your card titled Sledgehammer Shot cannot be reversed from your opponent's hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reverse any Action card and end your opponent's turn. Search your Arsenal for 1 non-Reversal Superstar-specific card, reveal it to him, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent draws 3 cards and randomly discards 2 of them. When this card is in your Ring area, your opponent overturns 1 card whenever he draws any number of cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, cannot be reversed when played after a successfully played maneuver. Shuffle up to 12 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal. As a reversal, reverse any Action card and end your opponent's turn. Search your Arsenal for 1 card, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, this card is -15F, discard this card and then put up to 3 Maneuver cards from your Ringside pile on the bottom of your Arsenal. As a reversal, completely reverse any non-Trademark Finisher card and end your opponent's turn. Put 1 card from your Ringside pile on top of your Arsenal and then search your Arsenal for 1 card, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Search your Arsenal or Ringside pile for the card titled Roll Out of the Ring, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. When this card is in your Ring area, the maximum number of Mid-match cards you may have in your Ring area is increased by 1.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, this card is -5D, your opponent discards cards equal to the number of Superstar-specific cards in your Ring area. As a reversal, reverse any Strike or Submission maneuver and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Look at your opponent's hand, choose 1 card, and he puts that card on top of his Arsenal. He may remove the top 4 cards of his Arsenal from the game. If he does not, he overturns 20 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reverse any non-unique Action card and end your opponent's turn. Search your Arsenal for 1 Unique maneuver, reveal it to him, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, this card is -2F and -4D, put this card on the bottom of your Arsenal and then draw 2 cards. As a reversal, reverse any maneuver of 9D or less and end your opponent's turn. When this card is in your Ring area, your maneuvers are +2D.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You may pack up to 4 copies of this card. The maximum number of Pre-match cards you may have in your Ring area is increased by 1. Your Starting Hand Size is +1. At the end of the Pre-match phase, put 1 card from your hand on the bottom of your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, this card is -16F. As a reversal, reverse any card and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is in your Ring area, if your opponent reverses a card from his Arsenal, you may remove this card from the game and then continue your turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Search your Arsenal or Ringside pile for 1 Unique card, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. If your next card played this turn is a maneuver, you may ignore the 'Can only be played after...'text.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reverse any Action card and end your opponent's turn. Search your Arsenal for 1 Unique card, reveal it to him, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reverse any Unique card and end your opponent's turn. Put any number of cards from your hand on top of your Arsenal and then shuffle triple that many cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal.

card.name: You Want Some? Come Get Some!

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Choose 1 for every copy of this card in your Ring area: shuffle cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal, draw cards, or your opponent discards cards, all equal to the Stun Value in your Ring area.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, put 1 Unique card or 1 card titled Diversion from your Ringside pile into your hand or put 1 Mid-match card from your Ringside pile into your Backlash deck. As a reversal, completely reverse any Multi card and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, shuffle this card into your Arsenal, put 1 card titled Puppies! Puppies! from your Ringside pile into your hand, and your opponent overturns 2 cards. As a reversal, when overturned, reverse any Strike or High Risk maneuver and end your opponent's turn

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put 1 Unique card from your Ringside pile into your hand. When this card is in your Ring area, once during each of your turns you may put 1 card from your hand under this card and then put 1 card from your Ringside pile on the bottom of your Arsenal. You may play the cards under this card as if they were in your hand. If this card is moved from your Ring area, put the cards under this card into your Ringside pile.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, search your Arsenal for 1 non-Reversal card, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. As a reversal, when overturned, reverse any non-unique maneuver and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You may discard 1 card. When this card is in your Ring area, your maneuvers are +1D for every card in your hand fewer than 7.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be reversed from your opponent's Arsenal when played after the card titled Ego Boost, when the card titled European Uppercut is in your Ring area, or when your opponent is a Legend Superstar.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, this card is -4D, search your Arsenal for 1 Maneuver card, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. As a reversal, reverse any Unique card and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, this card is -7F, search your Arsenal for 1 Superstar-specific Maneuver card, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. As a reversal, reverse any Submission or High Risk maneuver and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When successfully played, search your Arsenal for 1 Maneuver card, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When your Fortitude Rating is 0 and your opponent's Fortitude Rating is 10 or more, this card is -6F and can only be reversed from his Arsenal. When successfully played, shuffle up to 4 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, shuffle up to 5 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal. As an action, this card is -22F and -18D, discard this card and then search your Arsenal for 1 card with the word 'sleeper'in the title, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. When this card is in your Ringside pile, your cards with the word 'sleeper'in the title are -4F.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Draw 4 cards, your opponent discards 4 cards, search your Arsenal for 1 card and put it into your hand, put 9 cards from your Ringside pile on top of your Arsenal, shuffle 6 of your cards that have been removed from the game into your Arsenal, and then look at the top 8 cards of his Arsenal and put them back on the top or bottom of his Arsenal in any order.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played, you may discard 1 card. If you do, this card is -10F.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: This card is -5F when your Fortitude Rating is less than your opponent's Fortitude Rating. Reverse any Strike or Grapple maneuver and end your opponent's turn. When this card is in your Ring area, once during each of your turns you may remove 3 cards in your Ringside pile from the game and then put 1 Unique card from your Ringside pile into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is in your Ringside pile, during your turn you may put this card and 1 card from your hand on the bottom of your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: This card is -3F and +3D for every Grapple maneuver in your Ring area.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, put this card on the bottom of your Arsenal and then look at your opponent's hand, choose 1 card, and he discards the chosen card. As a reversal, when overturned, reverse any non-damage card effect or non-unique maneuver and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played, you may overturn 3 cards. If you do, this card is -10F. When your next card played this turn is a maneuver, it is +10D. When your next card played this turn is an Action card, it is -10F. When this card is in your Ring area, during your turn you may put this card on the bottom of your Arsenal and then shuffle up to 10 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played from your hand, reverse any non-unique maneuver and end your opponent's turn. You may overturn up to 10 cards and then shuffle the same number of your cards that have been removed from the game into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Look at the top 3 cards of your opponent's Arsenal and remove 1 from the game, put 1 into his Ringside pile, and put 1 on top of his Arsenal. Look at the top 3 cards of your Arsenal and put 1 into your hand, 1 into your Backstage area, and 1 into your Ringside pile.
